body: These motherfuckers are comically ugly. Thanks for your hard work @xevry.

Yeah going off of @uelveelze, it its very much Netorase, no full on NTR. There are some moments that probably would count as NTR, but Jun is perfectly fine with Hina sleeping around, and he's present for it 90% of those times. (There's like a Yuri sub plot that happens between Hina and Mei, that Mei tries to hide from Jun.)

For people wondering, there is no NTR in the end.  It's just a bunch of people having a good time banging.  Chad bf just likes seeing his girlfriend get banged (and he's banging the other girls too).  In the end the couple still love each other, they're just down to share their bodies with everyone else.

This will not produce the same resentment as the cellphone manga or the "before I confessed my friend came in her" manga.  This manga is just people banging and having a good time.

@Whore4men It's just translated, it's going to be proofread by a different person, and once that's done, I'll receive the translations. I already have the the chapter cleaned, so once I get the translations, I'll be able to put it out quickly. (Chapter 5 is almost done being translated as well.)
Never thought I'd say this to you guys but thanks for the heads up

i already read all chapters.
if you vanilla fans, you better dont touch this manga.
Any Vanilla fans here just Dont read it and leave. This ryoh-zoh is curse so dont
This is that one where the mc is a cuck who makes his gf bang randoms right?
@xevry only chapter 4 translated and ready to be released? Or there's more but currently working on it??
Will they be all in one post or multiple?

I redid the typesetting for the 1st 3 chapters, and added all the uncensored versions of the covers (that I could find). Chapter 4's translations are done, but are waiting to be proofread. I commissioned Ero for all 16 chapters, so the full series will be translated in time.
